node.title: Captive Captivates BitTorrent Audience
node.content:
A few weeks ago, we distributed our first novel, Captive, through our Artist Spotlight pilot program. Like the previous music and film spotlights (for example Sick of Sarah, Zenith, Pioneer One and Four Eyed Monsters), our community embraced the book and, and now it’s officially surpassed 400,000 downloads!

More details on the promotion, the results and commentary from the author Megan Lisa Jones are available in the press release here. And if you haven’t yet had a chance to read the book, check it out in the App Studio or download the torrent here.
